description: Internal alterations including the provision of office, glass wash and cooled beer store in the existing lounge/saloon kitchen area together with the provision of toilet facilities with access from the billiard room including alterations to non-load bearing walls and the installation of a partition; alteration and extension of the saloon bar, alterations to form a bar servery hatch in the main function room giving access to the saloon bar; alterations to the existing toilets to provide storage and disabled toilet facilities; internal access lobby, repairs to skylight, alterations to some internal doorways, general internal refurbishment and redecoration including lighting, conversion of 2 first floor bedrooms to provide staff facilities , conversion of first floor kitchen to bedroom, first floor roof terrace including openings and external alterations including repair and repainting of external elevations, repairs to windows and parapet, smoking shelter and bin store and external seating adjoining the listed building all in association with the re-use of the building as a public house with first floor ancillary guest house accommodation (Listed Building Consent).
